questions.question: What is the dominant color of the product's packaging?

Considering the packaging's texture, what is its overall feel?
What kind of printing is predominantly used on the packaging?

Does the packaging show any signs of damage or wear?
Is the orientation of the packaging primarily horizontal or vertical?
